articles.title: Sunil Chhetri to lead Indian men's football team at Asian Games - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Sunil Chhetri will captain the Indian men's football team at the Asian Games.
articles.content:
Sunil Chhetri will lead the Indian men's football team at the Asian Games as the All India Football Federation (AIFF) named the 17-member squad on Wednesday.
